attributes.action: Amend the animal welfare act 2006 to allow the exhibition of dogs that have had the whole or part of their tail removed for the purpose of its medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the animal welfare act 2006 section 6 sub section 9a to be amended to allow the showing and exhibition of dogs which have had the whole or part of its tail removed for the purpose of its medical treatment at a event to which members of the public are admitted on payment of a fee. To enable dogs which have suffered accidential tail damage to be shown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
